name: Notes From Igor
description:
Step into the shoes of Igor as you try your best to provide the electricity to feed your master's experiments.

Be sure to view the Notes From Igor prior to Taking The Position.

ALSO, PLEASE NOTE THAT THIS GAME MAY TAKE A WHILE TO LOAD BASED ON YOUR INTERNET CONNECTION SPEED. WHY NOT ENJOY A NICE RELAXING WALK OUTSIDE? MAYBE A WARM CUP OF COFFEE OR TEA?
